title: Truffle Deploy to matic failed. only replay-protected (EIP-155) transactions allowed over RPC.
body:

- Truffle Config

```
    matic: {
      provider: () => new HDWalletProvider(privateKey, `https://rpc-mainnet.maticvigil.com`),
      network_id: 137,
      confirmations: 2,
      timeoutBlocks: 200,
      skipDryRun: true
    }
```

Also running into this issue when attempting to deploy to `polygon_infura_testnet` walking through the boilerplate repo `polygon-box` ... guide located here: https://github.com/truffle-box/polygon-box

Issue reported there: https://github.com/truffle-box/polygon-box/issues/1

ah - I missed this reply 

https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/issues/3913#issuecomment-842282897
